title: Cameo King: Can You Guess the Film By The Cameos Made By These Bollywood Celebrities?

persons.name: barsaat saawan dard bhari aankhen akshay kumar
jhoom barabar jhoom elaan chalo dilli you

text: Salman Khan looked like this in which movie cameo? Barsaat Saawan Dard Bhari Aankhen Akshay Kumar looked hot in this short role. Do you know the name of the film? Jhoom Barabar Jhoom Elaan Chalo Dilli You should not go wrong with this one. Abhishak Bachchan did a cameo in the movie...? Shudh Desi Romance
